title: Investment Banker

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose to invest up to 2 Profit in one of three stocks: red, blue, or green. You lose that much Profit and add it to that stock.
- At night, choose to sell stock. After new modifiers are applied, you lose all invested profit in the chosen stock, and gain 1 Profit for each removed. In addition, each investment removed applies the stock’s new modifier (for example, 3 stocks removed with a -2 modifier causes you to lose 6 Profit).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each stock starts with 0 invested Profit in it, and starts with a +0 modifier.
- At the start of each night, you learn of each stock’s modifier.
- At the end of each night, each stock’s modifier randomly increases or decreases by 1.
Item: Stockholder Certificate
- Cost 1
- Uses 1
- Invest: Choose to lose up to 3 Profit. Roll a modifier ranging from -1, 0, or +1. For each Profit initially removed, gain or lose the amount of Profit in the modifier.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all good players (to appease shareholders)
